environment

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.Cell

  • public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    The Cell class. This classed is used by the Maze class to create a two dimensional Cell array which represents the maze in the game. Each Cell object has an Integer array containing four integers representing the four walls surrounding the cell object. If the integer at a position has the value of 1, the wall exists, otherwise the wall doesn´t exist. The integer at position [0] in the array represents the north wall. The integer at position [1] in the array represents the south wall. The integer at position [2] in the array represents the west wall. The integer at position [3] in the array represents the east wall.
    Version:
    2019-01-06
    Author:
    Hanna Medén, Niklas Nordgren

      • walls

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        public Cell(int x,
            int y)
        Instantiates a new cell. Takes two Integers, x and y as parameter to determine the location of the Cell object in the two dimensional Cell array provided by the Maze class. Sets the xPixel variable to determine the location of the top left position of the Cell object on the x-axis. Sets the yPixel variable to determine the location of the top left position of the Cell object on the y-axis.
        Parameters:
        x - the x position
        y - the y position

    • Method Detail

      • drawWalls

        public void drawWalls(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the walls of a Cell object using an Graphics object g. The walls to be drawn depend on the Integer array walls values. An Integer value of 1 indicates that a wall should be drawn at corresponding position.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object

      • fillCell

        public void fillCell(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws a filled rectangle at the Cell objets position.
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object

      • getIsVisited

        public boolean getIsVisited()
        Checks if the Cell has been visited or not by getting the isVisited boolean variable. This method is used in the Maze class to create the maze of the game.
        Returns:
        the checks if is visited

      • setVisited

        public void setVisited(boolean isVisited)
        Sets the isVisited boolean variable. This method is used in the Maze class to create the maze of the game.
        Parameters:

      • isSolution

        public boolean isSolution()
        Checks if the Cell is a part of the path that leads to the goal.
        Returns:
        true, if it leads to the goal. false otherwise
